name: strip
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: strip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove, pull, or tear the covering or outer layer from something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 除去，剥除，撕掉（外皮或表层）

example.eg: Because of the pollution, the trees are almost completely stripped of bark.
example.egtrans: 由于受到污染，树木的表皮几乎完全脱落。

example.eg: The paintwork was so bad that we decided to strip off all the paint and start again.
example.egtrans: 漆面太糟，我们决定铲去所有的油漆，重漆一遍。

example.eg: During the summer months, the sheep strip the mountains bare.
example.egtrans: 夏天的几个月里，羊群把山上啃得光秃秃的。

dsense.name: strip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove your clothing, or to remove all the clothing of someone else

example.eg: The men were ordered to strip.
example.egtrans: 那些男人被命令把衣服脱光。

example.eg: Suddenly he stripped off and ran into the sea.
example.egtrans: 他突然脱掉衣服冲进大海。

example.eg: He had been stripped naked, beaten and robbed.
example.egtrans: 他被脱光衣服，遭受殴打，东西还被抢了。

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove your clothing as an entertainment

example.eg: She stripped to pay her way through college.
example.egtrans: 她通过跳脱衣舞来挣钱付大学学费。

dsense.name: strip
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove parts of a machine, vehicle, or engine in order to clean or repair it
trans_examp.trans_cn: 拆卸，拆开（机器、车辆或引擎）

example.eg: I've decided to strip down my motorbike and rebuild it.
example.egtrans: 我已经决定了把摩托车拆开重新组装。

trans_examp.trans_en: to remove the parts of a car, etc. in order to sell them

name: strip
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: strip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: He didn't have a bandage, so he ripped up his shirt into thin strips.
example.egtrans: 他没有绷带，就把衬衫撕成细条。

example.eg: Protect the magnetic strip on your credit card from scratches, heat, or other damage.
example.egtrans: 注意保护信用卡的磁条，防止划伤、受热及其他损伤。

dsense.name: strip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the clothing worn by a football team that has the team's colours on it

example.eg: The team will be wearing its new strip at next Saturday's match.
example.egtrans: 球队在下周六的比赛中将穿新队服亮相。

dsense.name: strip
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an entertainment in which the performer removes all his or her clothing

example.eg: He jumped up on the table and started to do a strip.
example.egtrans: 他跳上桌子，开始跳起了脱衣舞。
